name: The Endless House
description:
Submission for the GoGodot game jam.

There's and issue with the HTML5 export audio, there's a weird crackle, so it's better if you download the game.

Your objective is to explore the house and eventually find an exit. Check your character's stats with TAB and keep him alive.

Search cupboards, fridges, dressers and other places to find food and supplies to to prevent your character from starving or dying from wounds. Sleep on beds and couches to prevent him from passing out from exhaustion, but beware, every time you sleep, the house grows.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • E to interact / Advance cutscenes
  • Space to dodge
  • 1,2,3 and 4 to select weapons you pick up
  • LMB to shoot
  • RMB to shove enemies
  • R to reload
  • F to toggle your flashlight
  • TAB to check your status
  • Esc or P to pause or skip cutscenes
